name: Furious 8 Racing
description:
Furious 8 Racing

Feel the Real Speed and race with the Fastest cars in best arcade car racing game.

Furious 8 Racing is real furious car racing game in fast-paced 3D racing action. Race your car with high speed and set new high standards for mobile car racing games.

Be the Best Road Driver
Furious 8 Racing is a great 3D car racing simulator game. Become the driver of some of the fastest cars in the world. Drive thru the City streets in a collection of environments.
This amazingly realistic racing car driving simulation game is packed full of super cool fast race cars and exciting, dynamic racing levels.

Earn Cash:
Beat the cars earn the credit, grab the bonus, and get new cars to beat the other challengers that have more heavy steel than yours.
With fast car you more skills to handle them. Are you ready for the challenge? Are you enough trained to control this piece of metal?.

Realistic Cars:
In Furious 8 Racing, you can drive many extremely Fast, beautiful cars on asphalt tracks, tokyo streets, desert mountains, and many others.
Start your career, win badges on each championship, keep on time racing, and buy new cars to compete in more demanding races.
Start driving in unique cars - never seen before on the asphalt roads in reality and computer games.

Tune and Upgrade
Earn points and coins, and unlock cars. Adjust to your driving style with 7 ways to control your car thru your mobile device. Choose which car do you prefer and buy the one from your dreams. Become the fastest driver in the city and earn respect from other teams. Show them who is the real car racer.

Realistic City and environments
- Universe of illegal races awaits for you. Race in different modes on dangerous asphalt tracks in City.
- Show your rivals that you are the best in real competition with amazing speed. Pass beautiful modern buildings in real Tokyo street, take unbelievable turns, achieve highest possible velocity among neon.
- Furious 8 Racing offers you a great, fun gaming experience that will help you to become the king of the streets and the best driver on them.
- So are you excited to get behind the wheel of some realistic super cars and race against other racers, then you'll be very excited to play Fast Furious!

KEY FEATURES
* Stunning 3D graphics and awesome physics in the player car and opponent cars
* Smooth and realistic car handling
* Different new cars to choose from: sport cars, roadsters, fastest cars!
* Detailed environment and great colored images
* Great NPC racers


TIPS
* The faster you drive the more scores you get
* As many laps you get more score you get
* Avoid to crash and you get Perfect Lap!
